name: Back2Top
description: Adds a button to your site wich scroll animated back to top of your site

custom_css.label: Custom CSS
custom_css.info: If you want to add your own style, add it here! ( Example CSS: width:60px; height:60px; position:fixed;  background:rgba(120, 120, 120, 0.8) url(arrow.svg) no-repeat center 50%; bottom:20px; right:20px; )
